product_name: The North Face Better Than Naked Singlet - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Developed by athletes and made for performance, The North Face Better Than Naked women's singlet wicks moisture, breathes well and dries quickly to help you feel strong, fast and hungry for victory. Specialized FlashDry(TM) fabric wicks moisture, breathes well and dries quickly. Mesh panels at sides and back promote cooling airflow where needed. Stitchless seams reduce chafing; reflective logos increase your visibility in low light. The women's Better Than Naked Singlet is part of The North Face Flight Series(TM), developed and tested by outdoor athletes. Closeout.
short_description: Developed by athletes and made for performance, The North Face Better Than Naked women's singlet wicks moisture, breathes well and dries quickly to help you feel strong, fast and hungry for victory.
